title: 始之伊吕波 中心页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**标题：**始之伊吕波 中心页
**作者：**始之伊吕波制作委员会
**译者：**[[*user Backlight SH]]
**发布年份：**2024年
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[=]]
+ 何为“始之伊吕波”？

**本企划是基金会日本分部四十余名成员参加的、该分部史上最大的文选企划。每个作者根据某个以特定假名开头（伊吕波顺序）的日语词汇写作文章，全部以“始”为主题，是为了庆祝2024年开年的文选。**

**不过虽说是“始”，也许是充满希望的开始，也许是讽刺悲剧的开始，这都并不确定。无论是生命在这世上诞生，或是见到明天的朝阳，皆能以一始字以蔽之。**
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[tabview]]

[[tab 概况]]
2022年10月，SCP基金会本部发起的文选活动“[[[scp-anthology-hub|死亡ABC]]]”掀起了一阵热潮。参加文选的人员被分配了不同的拉丁字母，以使用其为首字母的单词作为主题来完成他们的文章。这场活动在日本也引起了极大反响，新老交替的作者们个性十足的作品们，以统一的“死亡ABC”为主题扩展的故事、增添内容的设定、漫长的噩梦也吸引了许多爱好者。

认为只是目睹这种企划实属可惜的日本分部因此也发起了文选活动。自2024年1月9日起，不同作者以**“‘〇’代表‘〇〇’”**为标题，按照伊吕波假名顺序写作文章。

如同页面上方的内容所述，参加本次活动的作品共通主题为“始”，与本部的“死亡”相对应。希望能借此让各位观赏到作者们极富个性的作品。
[[/tab]]

[[tab 规则]]
**※本次活动全部内容（含中心页）均由“始之伊吕波制作委员会”制作，不接受其他成员投稿。**

+ 作品规则
参加企划的作品必须满足以下条件：
* 具备“SCP”标签。
* 主题为“始”。
* 文章题目遵循“概况”一栏的的固定格式。
* 每篇文章下方需设有通往前一页面、中心页和下一页面的导航栏（如“ろ”的文章下方应当是“い”和“は”）。
* 所有的文章内容在委员会内部进行讨论。
* 文章编号按照伊吕波顺序由低到高，全部属于SCP-JP系列Ⅳ（不接受--001提案、搞笑作品、--已解明作品投稿）。
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]

[[module CSS]]

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Serif+SC|Noto+Serif+SC&display=swap');

body {
    background-image:url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-233-nws9/tatami");
    background-position: center;
    background-size: 45rem;
    font-family: Noto Serif SC;
}

h1 {
    color: inherit;
    font-family: Noto Serif SC;
}

div#container-wrap {
    background-image: none;
}

#header {
    background: none;
    height: 12rem;
    padding: 0;
}
#header h1 {
    float: none;
    height: 9rem;
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-height: unset;
    padding: 1rem 0 0;
    width: 9rem;
}
#header h1 a {
    background-color: #fff5;
    background-image: url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A3438721-266-50z4/scp-jp-sun.svg");
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    border-radius: 100%;
    box-shadow: #fff 0 0 10rem;
    font-size: 0;
    height: inherit;
    max-height: unset;
    padding: 0;
    text-shadow: none;
    width: inherit;
}
#header h2 {
    display: none;
}
#search-top-box {
    right: 0;
    top: 1rem;
    width: auto;
}
#search-top-box-input {
    display: none;
}
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit] {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    display: block;
    font-size: 0;
    height: 1.5rem;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 1.5rem;
}
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit]:is(:focus, :hover) {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    text-shadow: none;
}
#search-top-box-form::after {
    color: #555;
    content: "\f002";
    display: block;
    font-family: "FontAwesome";
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    line-height: 1;
    height: 1.5rem;
    pointer-events: none;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 1.5rem;
}
#top-bar {
    align-items: center;
    display: flex;
    height: 2.5rem;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 1rem;
    left: 0;
    line-height: 2.5;
    top: 10rem;
    right: 0;
    width: 100%;
}
.mobile-top-bar {
    position: static;
    max-width: unset;
}
#top-bar a {
    color: #000;
}
#top-bar > div,
#top-bar > div > ul,
#top-bar > div > ul > li,
#top-bar > div > ul > li > a {
    height: 100%;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li > a {
    border: none;
    display: block;
    line-height: 2.5;
    max-height: unset;
    padding: 0 .5rem;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li:last-of-type > ul {
    right: 0;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li:is(.sfhover, :hover) > :is(a, a:hover) {
    background: #006e54;
    border: none;
    color: #fff;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li:is(.sfhover, :hover) > ul {
    border: solid 2px #006e54;
    box-shadow: none;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li:is(.sfhover, :hover) > ul > li > a {
    background: #f3f3f3;
    border-top: solid 1px #006e54;
    color: #000;
    width: 15em;
}
#top-bar > div > ul > li:is(.sfhover, :hover) > ul > li:first-child > a {
    border: none;
}
#login-status {
    color: #000;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    right: 2rem;
    top: .75rem;
}
#login-status a {
    color: #555;
}
#login-status .printuser {
    font-size: 0;
}
#login-status .printuser a {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin: 0;
}
#login-status .printuser img.small {
    background: none !important;
    height: 1.5rem;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    width: 1.5rem;
}
#my-account,
#login-status :is(.login-status-create-account, .login-status-sign-in) {
    font-size: 0;
}
#my-account::before,
#login-status :is(.login-status-create-account, .login-status-sign-in)::before,
#login-status a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] + #account-topbutton::before {
    font-family: "FontAwesome";
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    line-height: 1;
    vertical-align: bottom;
}
#login-status .login-status-create-account + span {
    display: none;
}
#my-account::before {
    content: "\f013";
}
#login-status .login-status-create-account::before {
    content: "\f067";
}
#login-status .login-status-sign-in::before {
    content: "\f090";
}
#login-status > a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] > strong {
    display: none;
}
#account-topbutton {
    border: none;
    color: #000;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 1;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    vertical-align: bottom;
}
#login-status a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] + #account-topbutton {
    font-size: 0;
}
#login-status a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] + #account-topbutton::before {
    content: "\f0f3";
}
#account-options {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

#content-wrap {
    margin: 1rem auto 0;
    max-width: 60rem;
    min-height: unset;
}

#side-bar, #side-bar:target {
    background: #fffc;
    border: none;
    margin: 0;
}
#side-bar {
    left: -19em;
}
#side-bar:target {
    left: 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block {
    border: solid 3px #006e54;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
}
:is(#side-bar, #side-bar:target) .close-menu {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    transition: background-color .5s ease-in-out .1s,
     left .5s ease-in-out .1s;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: -1;
}
#side-bar .close-menu {
    background-color: transparent;
    left: 0em;
    pointer-events: none;
}
#side-bar:target .close-menu {
    background-color: #0000004d;
    left: 19em;
    pointer-events: all;
}

#main-content {
    background-color: #fff7;
    box-shadow: #fffa 0 0 5rem, #fffa 0 0 5rem;
    max-width: calc(100% - 3rem);
}

#page-title {
    border: none;
    color: inherit;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 900;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 0 0 1rem;
    padding: 0;
}

#page-content {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

#page-content div.creditRate {
    display: flex;
    float: none;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 0;
}

.article-list {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-around;
    list-style: none;
    gap: .5rem;
    margin: 1.5rem 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.article-list > li {
    display: block;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    max-width: calc(50% - .25rem);
    width: 10rem;
    word-break: break-all;
}
.karuta {
    aspect-ratio: 435 / 583;
    position: relative;
    transform-style: preserve-3d;
    transition: transform .5s ease-out;
}
.article-list > li.folded:hover .karuta {
    transform: rotateY(180deg);
}
.karuta > div {
    -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
    backface-visibility: hidden;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: solid 5px #006e54;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    height: 100%;
    padding: .25em;
    position: absolute;
    text-align: start;
    width: 100%;
    writing-mode: vertical-rl;
}
.karuta > div > .foldable-list-container > a {
    display: none;
}
.karuta > div .kana {
    border-radius: 1em;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 1.25em;
    height: 1em;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: .125em;
    width: 1em;
}
.karuta > .front {
    background-image: url("https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/dr-mackenzie-s-sketchbook/SCP-Logo-2400.png/medium.jpg");
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
}
.karuta > .front .kana {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: solid 1px #000;
    color: #000;
}
.karuta > .back {
    transform: rotateY(180deg);
}
.karuta > .back >  .title {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
    width: 100%;
}
.karuta > .back > .title :is(a, a:hover) {
    color: #006e54;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.karuta > .back .kana {
    background-color: #006e54;
    border: solid 1px #006e54;
    color: #fff;
}
.article-list > li > .about {
    text-align: center;
}
.article-list > li .about a {
    color: inherit;
}
.article-list > li .about a:is(:hover, :active) {
    color: #b01;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.article-list > li .about > a {
    font-size: 1.1em;
    font-weight: 900;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
.open-menu p {
    margin: 0;
}

.folded .karuta,
.article-list > li.folded:hover .karuta {
    transform: rotateY(0deg);
}
.unfolded .karuta {
    transform: rotateY(180deg);
}
.karuta > div .foldable-list-container > a {
    bottom: 0;
    display: block;
    font-size: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
}
.karuta > .front .foldable-list-container > a {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}
.karuta > .back .foldable-list-container > a {
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #006e54;
    color: #fff;
    display: flex;
    height: 2rem;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 2rem;
}
.karuta > .back .foldable-list-container > a::before {
    content: "\f0e2";
    font-family: "Noto Serif SC";
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    line-height: 1;
}
}
[[/module]]
author: Backlight SH
